refnamediv.refpurpose: the classic Super Star Trek game

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The Organian Peace Treaty has collapsed, and the Federation is at war with the Klingon Empire. Joining the Klingons against the Federation are the members of the Romulan Star Empire. As commander of the Starship U.S.S. Enterprise, your job is to wipe out the Klingon invasion fleet and make the galaxy safe for democracy.

This is one of the great early classic computer games from the 1970s and still has a remarkable amount of play value. Run sst in a terminal window to start it. Typing 'comands' at the prompt will list all commands; help is available for each one individually as well. Full documentation is browseable.

refsect1.title: AUTHORS
refsect1.para: Super Star Trek was designed and written by David Matuszek, Paul Reynolds, and Don Smith in the 1970s. It was resurrected by Tom Almy. This version has been cleaned up and documented by Eric S. Raymond <esr@snark.thyrsus.com>. There is a project page.
